Hello, my name is Jonah Douglas and I am excited you're here! I am a Junior Android Application Developer and I built GeoStereo as a fun way to establish my portfolio. This application was built using Android's language Kotlin with the help of their Jetpack components library and some APIs from Google, Weather, and Spotify.

 A quick outline of an Use Case:
 1. Open the GeoStereo Application.
 2. Allow location permissions to the application while it is open. **No data collection here**
 3. Press the 'Find Nearest Location' button and let the app take over!
 4. Enjoy a randomly selected song from Spotify that corresponds to the closest location data near you. (If no near locations, then weather will do!)

 I hope you thoroughly enjoy my app and please reach out to me via email at jonah.douglas23@gmail.com if you have any features or issues you'd like to let me know about!

 Best,
 Jonah Douglas
